title: For Unbound and other big gravel races, ‘safety first’ starts at the finish
content:
With bunch sprints increasingly common in the elite men's race, organizers are looking for ways to mitigate congestion with amateurs at the finish.

Read the full article at For Unbound and other big gravel races, ‘safety first’ starts at the finish on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
